1. REF: UN Chief Says There Is No Military Solution in Syria

    HYP: the UN chief says there is no military solution in Syria


  2. REF: Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon says his response to Russia 's stepped up military support for Syria is that `` there is no military solution '' to the nearly five-year conflict and more weapons will only worsen the violence and misery for millions of people .

    HYP: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon said that his response to Russia 's military support for Syria is that there is `` no military solution '' to the conflict that has lasted almost five years and several weapons would only escalate the violence and suffering of millions of people .


  3. REF: the U.N. chief again urged all parties , including the divided U.N. Security Council , to unite and support inclusive negotiations to find a political solution .

    HYP: the UN chief again urged all parties , including the divided UN Security Council to unite and support the negotiations to find a political solution .


  4. REF: ban told a news conference Wednesday that he plans to meet with foreign ministers of the five permanent council nations - the U.S. , Russia , China , Britain and France - on the sidelines of the General Assembly 's ministerial session later this month to discuss Syria .

    HYP: ban said Wednesday at a news conference that he plans to meet this month with the foreign ministers of the five permanent countries present in the council - the US , Russia , China , Britain and France - on the ministerial session of the General Assembly to discuss Syria .


  5. REF: he expressed regret that divisions in the council and among the Syrian people and regional powers `` made this situation unsolvable . ''

    HYP: ban expressed regret that the divisions in the council and among the Syrian people and the regional powers `` have made this situation intractable . ''


  6. REF: ban urged the five permanent members to show the solidarity and unity they did in achieving an Iran nuclear deal in addressing the Syria crisis .

    HYP: ban urged the five permanent members to show solidarity and unity shown when they managed to reach an agreement on Iran 's nuclear weapons , thus addressing the crisis in Syria .

  194. REF: more specifically , the market over the past 35 years or so is most often up sharply - about 14 percent - heading into the rate hike , fairly flat in the 250 days after ( average gain of 2.6 percent ) then back to normal once 500 days have passed , with average return in the past six cycles of 14.4 percent , according to a recent analysis Bob Doll , chief equity strategist at Nuveen Asset Management , posted on Barron 's .

  577. REF: after attending the Conservatoire National Superieur de Musique in Paris under the direction of Regis Pasquier , during which he received advice and encouragement from famous artists such as Schlomo Mintz and Isaac Stern , David Grimal studied for a year at the Ecole des Science Politiques before meeting with Philippe Hirshhorn in Paris , meeting which changed the course of life .

    HYP: having followed the Conservatoire National Superieur de Musique in Paris under the guidance of Regis Pasquier , during which he received advice and encouragement from some renowned artists such as Schlomo Mintz and Isaac Stern , David Grimal has studied for a year at the Ecole Polytechnique des Science Politiques in Paris ahead of a meeting with Philippe Hirshhorn , who later changed his life .


  578. REF: David Grimal has an international career as a solo violinist . during the last 20 years he held regular concerts on the main classical music stages of the world with prestigious orchestras such as the Orchestre de Paris , Orchestre Philharmonique de Radio France , Russian National Orchestra , Orchestre National de Lyon , Chamber Orchestra of Europe , Berliner Symphoniker , New Japan Philharmonic , Orchestre de l'Opera de Lyon , Salzburg Mozarteum Orchestra , Jerusalem Symphony Orchestra and Sinfonia Varsovia under the direction of conductors such as Christoph Eschenbach , Michel Plasson , Michael Schnwandt , Peter Csaba , Heinrich Schiff , Lawrence Foster , Emmanuel Krivine , Mikhail Pletnev , Rafael Fruhbeck de Burgos and Peter Eotvos , Andris Nelsons , Christian Arming .

    HYP: David Grimal has an international career as a solo violinist , along which gave regular concerts in the last 20 years on the main stages of the world 's classical music and with prestigious orchestras such as Orchestras Paris , Orchestras Philharmonique de Radio France , the Russian National Orchestra , the Lyon National Orchestras , the Chamber Orchestra of Europe , Berliner Symphoniker , the New Japan Philharmonic , Orchestras l Opera de Lyon , the Salzburg Mozarteum Orchestra , the Jerusalem Symphony Orchestra and the Warsaw Sinfonia , under the leadership of conductors such as Christoph Eschenbach , Michel Plasson , Michael Schnwandt , Peter Csaba , Heinrich Schiff , Lawrence Foster , Emmanuel Krivine , Mikhail Pletnev , Rafael Fruhbeck de Burgos and Peter Eotvos , Andris Nelsons , Christian Arming .


  579.     HYP: he was the recipient of some works with dedication from several composers , including Marc-Andre Dalbavie , Brice Pauset , Thierry Escaich , Jean-Francois Zygel , Alexander Gasparov , Victor Kissine , Fuminori Tanada , Richard Dubugnon , Ivan Fedele , Philippe Harrowing , Anders Hillborg , Oscar Bianchi , Guillaume Connesson and Frederic Verrieres .


  580. REF: besides his career as a solo artist , David Grimal wanted to explore more personal projects .

    HYP: in addition to his career as a solo artist , David Grimal has been keen to explore and more personal projects .

    HYP: after years and investigations without number , it was discovered that Nick suffers from an extremely rare disease , `` Auto-brewery syndrome . ''

  1302.     HYP: the strategy identifies a number of factors that can influence the immigration and asylum , including maintaining the conflicting situation in Syria , the conflict in Iraq , maintaining an unstable situation in outlying areas of Romania ( Ukraine , Transnistria ) , perpetuating and increasing the intensity of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict .


  1303.     HYP: on the other hand , the document sets and some general strategic objectives relating to immigration , such as : the promotion of legal migration , tighter controls of the legality of third-country nationals stay on Romanian territory and the proper application of the measures and restrictive measures , improving the national asylum system .


  1304. REF: the National Strategy includes specific objectives relevant for transposing and implementing overall strategic objectives .

    HYP: the national strategy also includes specific targets relevant to the transposition and implementation of the overall strategic objectives .

  1393. REF: barbed wire , aggressive laws , prisons and brutality certainly will not solve the problem - they will just show that in Hungary , in the heart of Europe , there are policymakers no better than those in Syria , Libya and other fleeing refugee countries !

    HYP: barbed wire , aggressive laws , prisons and brutality certainly will not solve the problem - only show that in Hungary , in the heart of Europe , are political decision makers with nothing better than those in Syria , Libya or other countries from which the refugees are fleeing !

  1637.
